title: Why can't I expand the beta client? I saw Magickarp could why can't I?
body: The maximum is 1024x576 and its so weird and its small compared to my screen. Plus its slow yes I know its beta but I;m starting to like the legacy client way more

replies.body:
Note, however, that it won't let you set the client to be larger than your available screen space.
The space taken up by your taskbar is not counted as part of your available screen space.

If you want it edge to edge at 1920 pixels, you need a 1920x1200 monitor.
I believe that if you only have 1920x1080, it will refuse to expand to that size.
You can change the size of the client in the option menu.
Ye but all I have is a 1025x576 option
That's wierd. i changed mine as soon as it updated.
gonna do a full repair thing

Honestly, I don't like the visuals as much because everything blends in with eachother, not enough contrast between the important stuff (like buttons or tab buttons) and the backgrounds. I will probably get used to it over time though.

I don't have any issues with the size of the window, but I do not see why allowing more options would be a bad thing.
